00030   $Id: main.c,v 1.1 2009/05/20 20:52:01 mvidales Exp $

00032 
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <stdio.h>
00035 #include "stdbool.h"
00036 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00037 #include <string.h>
00038 #include "radio.h"
00039 #include "mac.h"
00040 #include "mac_event.h"
00041 #include "timer.h"
00042 #include "serial.h"
00043 #include "mac_start.h"
00044 #include "mac_data.h"
00045 #include "mac_associate.h"
00046 #include "system.h"
00047 #include <avr/wdt.h>
00048 #if PLATFORM == RAVENUSB
00049 #include "ravenusb/usb_task.h"
00050 #include "ravenusb/cdc_task.h"
00051 #else
00052 // Make the compiler accept these unused function names
00053 #define usb_task_init()
00054 #define cdc_task_init()
00055 #define usb_task()
00056 #define cdc_task()
00057 #endif // RAVENUSB
00058 
00059 /* On restart WDT will be enabled with shortest timeout if previously
00060    enabled. Must turn it off before anything else, attempting to
00061    disable within the main() function will take too long. */
00062    
00063 void disable_wdt(void) \
00064       __attribute__((naked)) \
00065       __attribute__((section(".init3")));
00066     void disable_wdt(void)
00067     {
00068       MCUSR = 0;
00069       wdt_disable();
00070     }
00071 
00075 int main(void)
00076 {
00077     // Setup clock speed
00078     halSetupClock();
00079 
00080     if (PLATFORM == RAVENUSB)
00081         // For USB
00082         Clear_prescaler();
00083 
00084     // init serial
00085     if (SERIAL)
00086         serial_init(NULL);
00087 
00088     // Init the timer system for the MAC
00089     timerInit();
00090 
00091     // Init the USB connection on USB platforms
00092     if (PLATFORM == RAVENUSB)
00093     {
00094         usb_task_init();
00095         cdc_task_init();
00096     }
00097 
00098     // Init the (sample) application
00099     appInit();
00100 
00101      // Main forever loop for the application.
00102     for(;;)
00103     {
00104         // Turn interrupts on if they are off.  They should always be on
00105         // at this point in the loop, so just turn them on every time, in
00106         // case interrupts were inadvertently turned off elsewhere.
00107         sei();
00108 
00109         // Task functions called from main loop.  Either add your own task loop
00110         // or edit the example appTask().
00111         appTask();
00112         macTask();
00113         // USB tasks
00114         if (PLATFORM == RAVENUSB)
00115         {
00116             usb_task();
00117             cdc_task();
00118         }
00119     }
00120     return 0;
00121 }
